code: import{useState}from"react";import quizQuestions10th from"./quizQuestions10th";import"./styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Quiz10th(){const[currentQuestion,setCurrentQuestion]=useState(0);const[answers,setAnswers]=useState([]);const questionData=quizQuestions10th[currentQuestion];const totalQuestions=quizQuestions10th.length;const handleOptionClick=option=>{const updatedAnswers=[...answers];updatedAnswers[currentQuestion]=option;setAnswers(updatedAnswers);};const handleNext=()=>{if(!answers[currentQuestion]){alert("Please select an option");return;}if(currentQuestion<totalQuestions-1){setCurrentQuestion(currentQuestion+1);}else{alert("Quiz completed!");console.log("Final Answers:",answers);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quiz-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quiz-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:questionData.question}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"options-grid",children:questionData.options.map((option,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"option-btn ".concat(answers[currentQuestion]===option?"selected":""),onClick:()=>handleOptionClick(option),children:option},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quiz-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next-btn ".concat(currentQuestion===totalQuestions-1?"finish-btn":""),onClick:handleNext,children:currentQuestion===totalQuestions-1?"Finish":"Next"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"question-count",children:["Question ",currentQuestion+1," of ",totalQuestions]})]});}export default Quiz10th;
